imdb.title: Super Lovers
imdb.plot: While spending summer with his mother, Haru meets Ren, a boy newly adopted by his mother. Getting along with Ren isn't easy as Haru's goal is to "civilize" him by the time summer ends. Their relationship slowly improves as Haru sp...

episodes.title: In the Pink
episodes.plot: It's been three months since Haru's dream to live under the same roof with all three of his brothers came true. However, the situation at the Kaidou household suddenly becomes stormy when Haruko announces she's taking Ren back to Switzerland with her.

episodes.title: Gold Star
episodes.plot: Because their mother Haruko is staying with them, Haru continues to watch his public displays of affection with Ren. Without much consideration for his situation, Ikuyoshi asks Haru a question.

episodes.title: White Lie
episodes.plot: It's Ren's first summer vacation in Japan. The landlord of the apartment he and Haru once lived in hires him to clean one of his apartment units. Haru becomes unbearably curious when Ren refuses to tell him why he got a part time job.

episodes.title: See Red
episodes.plot: Ren is forced into the car of a strange man. Natsuki, who bears a striking resemblance to Haru, claims to be the cousin of the Kaidou brothers. Shiba Natsuo tells Ren to keep it a secret from his brothers that they met.

episodes.title: Black and White
episodes.plot: Ren spends the night away from home and brings home a large amount of money. Haru, who was up all night with worry, begins acting cold towards Ren when he won't tell him why.

episodes.title: Marine Blue
episodes.plot: The accident that made Haru lose his parents seven years ago left him on the brink of death. Though he made a miraculous recovery, he hasn't gone to the hospital for a checkup since he was released, so a concerned Aki and Shima ask Ren to take him there.

episodes.title: Sweet Peach
episodes.plot: A new tenant is moving into Onodera's aparment where Haru and Ren used to live, and Ren is helping to clean the room. The man who appears with Onodera is Takamura, the school nurse at Ren's high school.

episodes.title: Heavy Fog
episodes.plot: Unable to stand being treated like a child by Haru, Ren leaves the house. Natsuo agrees to let Ren stay over, but Haru shows up just as he's about to grant Ren's request to do something that he "can't tell Haru about."

episodes.title: Happy Days
episodes.plot: Since Haru declared that he belongs to Ren, Ren has stopped making unreasonable requests. Though plenty of women still come to the cafe, Haru has begun flatly rejecting them, and their days are peaceful.

episodes.title: Forest Green
episodes.plot: On his summer vacation Haru visits his mother in Canada and she burdens him the responsibility of taking care of her newly adopted child. Ren is a small, anti-social little boy who doesn't trust anyone but when he meets Haru, his life gradually changes.

episodes.title: Black Eye
episodes.plot: Five years later Haru must find out that he had given a promise long ago.

episodes.title: White Christmas
episodes.plot: Haru struggles with his feelings. Ren makes a hard decision.

episodes.title: Young Grass
episodes.plot: After a year in Canada Haru and Ren are back in Japan. Haru wants to live with his brothers, but Ren isn't sure if this is a good idea.

episodes.title: Cherry Blossom
episodes.plot: Just when Ren begins attending school, he's seen kissing Haru goodbye by his classmate who is curious about their relationship.

episodes.title: Cloudy Sky
episodes.plot: While Haru and Ren are out at a nearby zoo, Aki calls Haru to let him know a woman calling herself "Kiyoka" has showed up at the house. Kiyoka is Haru's high school classmate and the co-owner of the cafe they're about to open.

episodes.title: White Fang
episodes.plot: Ren manages his school life with the help of his classmates, but he collapses during a PE class.

episodes.title: Blue Sky
episodes.plot: Haru's cafe "WHITE FANG" begins flourishing immediately after it opens. Even Haru and Ren's recently awkward relationship is getting back to normal. However, Aki is in a terrible mood.

episodes.title: Rainy Season
episodes.plot: Haru suddenly awakens to the sound of rain in his room. Shaken by the sight of Ren in his dream, his breathing becomes erratic. Realizing the reason for his dream, the next morning Haru questions Ikuyoshi.

episodes.title: Summer Storm
episodes.plot: Haru's mom pays the Kaido brothers a sudden visit from Canada. What dose she know about Haru and Ren? What did Ren tell her? Haru is afraid he will get into some trouble.
